articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
According to data from the on-chain transaction tracker Lookonchain, the Ethereum Foundation recently made a significant move by depositing 35,000 ETH, valued at $94.07 million, into crypto exchange Kraken. This substantial transaction has raised concerns within the Ethereum investor community, particularly since it occurred during a minor crypto market rally as the week came to a close.
 
 
The timing and magnitude of this transfer have led to speculation among investors, who are wary of its potential impact on Ethereum’s price and overall market stability. In response to these concerns, Aya Miyaguchi, the director of the Ethereum Foundation, clarified that the transfer was part of the foundation’s routine treasury activities. 
 
She emphasized that such transactions are necessary for mai…
articles.title: Kraken Receives $100M In ETH From Ethereum Foundation Wallet: Impending Sell-Off?

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
Samson Mow, a Bitcoin influencer and the CEO of JAN3, recently made waves with his predictions on the future price of Bitcoin. He shared his outlookᅳbullish for the price trajectory of Bitcoinᅳin a post on the social media site X (formerly Twitter) recently.
 
 
According to Mow, Bitcoin is at its “sale” moment, telling people that prices below $100,000 are what smart investors want. He quoted, “Any price below $0.1M is still #Bitcoin on sale,” insinuating that when Bitcoin reaches this price, the sale will then come to an end.
 
Bitcoin’s Recent Spike
 
On August 23, 2024, Bitcoin saw one of its largest price surges, as it gained over 6% from around $60,700 to approximately $64,450. It followed after a comment by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on interest rate cuts, most of which inv…
articles.title: Bitcoin Maxi, CEO Expects ‘$0.01 Million’ As Threshold For BTC ‘Sale’ – Details

articles.title: Wazirx Founder Denies Remaining Assets Are Gone, Warns About New Fake Account Trend

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: In just seven months—roughly 236 days—since the year began, the crypto economy has ballooned by a staggering $623 billion. The top crypto asset, bitcoin, has seen its market value soar by more than $20,000, while ethereum, the second-largest by market cap, has climbed over $470 during this period. Top 10 Crypto Market Climbs From $1.37T […]
articles.title: Crypto Market Surges by $623B in 2024 as Bitcoin Climbs $20K Higher

articles.author: Opeyemi Sule
articles.description:
According to a popular crypto analyst on the X platform, the Bitcoin price might be primed for a fresh rally beyond its current all-time high. However, the analyst has identified a crucial resistance level that could determine the fate of the flagship cryptocurrency in the short term.
 
$67,300 Could Prove Pivotal To BTC’s Price — Here’s Why
 
In a new post on X, prominent crypto pundit Ali Martinez has put forward an exciting projection for the price of Bitcoin over the next few weeks. This bullish forecast is based on the MVRV (Market Value to Realized Value) Pricing Bands, which allow users to estimate price levels where the market would be at an extreme unrealized profit (high values) or unrealized loss (low values).
 
 
These price levels are relevant because they signal where certain…
articles.title: Bitcoin Price Could Rally To $80,500, But Here’s What Needs To Happen

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: Following Telegram founder Pavel Durov’s arrest, Tesla CEO Elon Musk posted the hashtag #FreePavel on his social media platform X. The hashtags #FreePavel and #FreeDurov emerged as supporters protested Durov’s arrest and called for his release. Durov is known for his strong stance on privacy and free speech, often clashing with government authorities over his […]
articles.title: Elon Musk Supports Efforts to Free Telegram CEO Pavel Durov

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The quest for higher returns often leads investors to explore new and emerging opportunities. Recently, a notable shift has occurred as top investors from Base Dawgz (DAWGZ), a popular ICO, have begun migrating to a rival project, Mpeppe (MPEPE). This migration is driven by the promise of better returns and the innovative features that Mpeppe (MPEPE) offers. Here’s a look at why these investors are making the switch and what it could mean for the future of both projects.
 
Base Dawgz (DAWGZ): The Initial Hype and What Led to Investor Interest 
Base Dawgz (DAWGZ) gained considerable attention in the crypto community for its unique approach to decentralized finance (De-Fi) and its strong community backing. The project quickly amassed a significant following, with investors flocking to its IC…
articles.title: ICO Battles: Base Dawgz (DAWGZ) Top Investors Join Rivals Mpeppe For Better Returns

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is in a constant state of evolution, with new projects and tokens emerging that push the boundaries of what digital assets can achieve. Among these, Mpeppe (MPEPE), Pepe Unchained (PEPU), and Pepecoin (PEPE) are three cryptocurrencies that are making significant waves. Each of these tokens brings something unique to the table, and together, they are reshaping the landscape of cryptocurrency. Here’s how Mpeppe (MPEPE), Pepecoin (PEPE), and Pepecoin (PEPE)are changing the game.
 
Mpeppe (MPEPE): Where Sports Passion Meets Blockchain Innovation 
Mpeppe (MPEPE) is more than just a cryptocurrency; it’s a movement that embodies the fusion of sports passion, blockchain innovation, and the transformative power of meme culture. Drawing inspiration from the monumental impac…
articles.title: MPEPE, PEPU & PEPE Three Cryptos That Are Changing The Landscape Of Cryptocurrency

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Savvy investors are constantly on the lookout for the next big opportunity to maximize their returns. Recently, a significant trend has emerged among holders of Pepe unchained (PEPU) as many have started to diversify their portfolios by splitting their investments with Mpeppe (MPEPE). This strategic move is driven by the potential for Mpeppe (MPEPE) to deliver up to 300x returns, making it an attractive option for those looking to capitalize on the booming meme coin market.
 
Why Pepe unchained (PEPU) Holders Are Eyeing Mpeppe (MPEPE) 
Pepe unchained (PEPU) has garnered a strong following thanks to its innovative approach to combining meme culture with decentralized finance (De-Fi). The project builds on the legacy of Pepecoin (PEPE) and aims to elevate the meme coin concept by integrating…
articles.title: Pepe unchained (PEPU) Holders Have Split Their Bag With Mpeppe (MPEPE) to Receive 300x Returns

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is brimming with opportunities for those who know where to look. Among the myriad of tokens and projects, three stand out for their potential to deliver massive returns: Mpeppe (MPEPE), Internet Computer (ICP), and Render (RENDER). Analysts are increasingly bullish on these cryptocurrencies, with some predicting up to 600x profits. O…
articles.title: Do Not Miss Out On 600x Profits From Mpeppe (MPEPE), Internet Computer (ICP) and Render (RENDER)

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Few projects have managed to sustain their momentum while delivering continuous value to their communities. Among these standout projects are Internet Computer (ICP) and Mpeppe (MPEPE). Both cryptos have captured the attention of investors and enthusiasts alike, not just for their innovative technology, but for their enduring ability to give back to their communities in meaningful ways. This article explores why Internet Computer and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are considered cryptos that keep on giving and why they are worth watching closely alongside other projects like Render (RNDR).
 
Internet Computer (ICP): Revolutionizing the Internet 
Internet Computer (ICP) is one of the most ambitious projects in the cryptocurrency space, aiming to revolutionize the internet as we know it. By creating a decen…
articles.title: Internet Computer And Mpeppe (MPEPE) Two Crypto That Keep on Giving.

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: The Colombian Industry and Commerce Superintendence (SIC), the personal data protection authority of the country, has formulated charges against Worldcoin, the biometric digital ID project, for violations of the personal data regime. The institution stated that the accusation focuses on determining whether Worldcoin violated Colombian law in its handling of the personal and private data […]
articles.title: Colombian Data Protection Authority Formulates Charges Against Worldcoin

articles.author: Semilore Faleti
articles.description:
A member of the Ethereum Foundation has recently addressed investors’ concerns following a massive ETH transfer by the non-profit organization on Friday.  This development is particularly important as this transaction sparked bearish talks in the crypto community especially due to EF’s association with the Ethereum network. 
 
 
$94 Million ETH Transfer Not A Selloff – Ethereum Foundation
 
On Friday, the Ethereum Foundation deposited 35,000 ETH, valued at $93.8 million, on the Kraken exchange leading to much speculation among ETH. These concerns stemmed from the bearish nature of such massive transactions as well as the role of the EF in the Ethereum ecosystem. 
 
Described as a non-profit organization, the EF claims a critical role in sponsoring technological development of the Ethereum …
articles.title: Ethereum Foundation Calms Bearish Concerns, Explains Reason For $94 Million ‘Selloff’

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: Mark Zuckerberg and Daniel Ek advocate for open-source AI in Europe. The two tech leaders believe that open-source AI can drive innovation and give Europe a competitive edge. However, they warn that fragmented regulations and uneven enforcement are hindering progress. They urge Europe to streamline regulations and focus on retaining talent to fully capitalize on […]
articles.title: Zuckerberg, Spotify Founder Advocate for Open-Source AI in Europe

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: El Salvador President Nayib Bukele highlighted his country’s commitment to free speech and safety in a recent social media post, indirectly referencing the arrest of Telegram CEO Pavel Durov in France. Bukele emphasized that El Salvador guarantees freedom from arrest, censorship, and asset seizure for exercising free speech, positioning the nation as a haven for […]
articles.title: ‘World’s Coolest Dictator’ Bukele Promotes El Salvador as Free Speech Haven
